title: Scrape data from a web page

url.title: Page URL
url.description: Just enter the URL of a web page and it will be used to generate lyrics for the song.

topmediai_api_key.title: API key for TopMediai
topmediai_api_key.description: If you provide your own TopMediai API key, you will be charged less.

song_genre.title: Song genre
song_genre.description: Song genre used to generate the song. If you don't provide a genre, the AI will suggest one based on the page content.
